scripts.start:local: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'npm run start:local -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:loop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'npm run start:loop -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'npm run start:test -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:beta: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'npm run start:beta -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:mocked: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'npm run start:mock -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground' --names 'lib-types,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:mock:e2e: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'npm run start:mock:e2e -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground' --names 'lib-types,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.types:watch: npm run types:watch -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web && npm run types:watch -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground
scripts.format:all: npm run format -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web-playground && npm run format -w @adyen/adyen-platform-experience-web
